title: What Does Angel Number 122 Mean? Plus, What to Do When You See It

steps.title: Angel number 122 is a positive sign of growth and change.
steps.content: Angel number 122 is a positive sign of growth and change. Take heart in knowing that the number 122 is an incredibly positive sign from your angels that symbolizes growth, healing, and positive changes. If you’ve been going through a bit of a rough patch recently, keep your chin up because things are about to take a turn for the better, whether that’s in your relationships, career, or private life. [1] X Research source 122 is also all about accepting your past mistakes and allowing yourself to heal from them. In order to manifest such positive change, be confident in yourself and your abilities. Your angels want you to know that they believe in you, so take that as a sign to have some faith in yourself as well.

steps.title: 122 is a sign to take charge of your life.
steps.content: 122 is a sign to take charge of your life. This angel number predicts positive changes coming, but your angels also want you to know that it’s up to you to bring such positivity into your life. Rather than sitting around and expecting things to come to you, your angels want you to take action and make an effort to achieve your goals and dreams. [2] X Research source If there’s something you’ve been hesitating on or unconsciously putting off, now’s the time to go for it. For example, maybe you’ve been procrastinating on applying for a job, starting a new hobby, or reaching out to a friend. Whatever it is, 122 might be the push you’ve been needing to get started.

steps.title: 1 symbolizes new beginnings, progress, and motivation.
steps.content: 1 symbolizes new beginnings, progress, and motivation. Angel numbers that include the number 1 often carry quite positive and uplifting messages. This is because 1 is associated with growth, determination, and a fresh start. When you see the number 1, it’s often a sign from your angels to take action toward chasing your dreams and taking advantage of new opportunities. [3] X Research source The number 1 also highlights the importance of positive thoughts and their power to create fruitful results and success.

steps.title: 2 represents balance and harmony.
steps.content: 2 represents balance and harmony. Whenever 2 pops up in an angel number, it’s a reminder to focus on connecting with people and working together to achieve your goals. 2 symbolizes the importance of relationships as well as inner balance. In order to move forward, achieving harmony with yourself and the people around you is integral. [4] X Research source Since 2 appears twice in 122, its power is doubled, and its message is given even more weight. The sum of 122 is 5 (1+2+2), which represents adventure, curiosity, and transformation in numerology. Two is also the number of intuition—seeing it is a sign to follow it (especially when you're seeing it in multiples). The number 122 means to take action (1) by following your intuition (2).

steps.title: If you’re in a relationship, remember to work as a team.
steps.content: If you’re in a relationship, remember to work as a team. 122 is all about building harmonious relationships in order to move forward and bring positivity to your life. If you’re in a relationship, check in with your partner to see if you’re really on the same page. Take some time to speak honestly about your expectations and thoughts on your relationship. If you’ve been facing some issues in your relationship, this is your opportunity to sort them out. [5] X Research source Healthy relationships are all about being mutually respectful of one another and setting boundaries around your expectations. Review your boundaries with your partner to make sure you’re really on the same page. Be a good listener to your partner and make an effort to compromise on things. If you work together as a team, your bond will likely only strengthen even more.

steps.title: If you’re single, create balance in your life before finding love.
steps.content: If you’re single, create balance in your life before finding love. 122 is also a sign of personal growth and change. While you may be itching to go out and find that special someone, your angels want to reassure you that there’s no rush. Instead, focus on yourself for a bit and work on establishing balance in your life before pursuing a relationship. [6] X Research source This might be a warning from your angels that there’s an area in your personal life that needs to be worked on before you’re ready to get involved in romance. For example, maybe you’ve been putting too much time into working and have been neglecting your private life. 122 might be a sign to work on maintaining a work-life balance before starting to date someone. 122 is a message to focus on loving yourself . When you truly love yourself, you’ll be able to give love to others much more easily. [7] X Research source

steps.title: 122 means you’ll meet your twin flame soon.
steps.content: 122 means you’ll meet your twin flame soon. This angel number is an overall positive sign when it comes to your twin flame relationship. However, it’s an especially lucky number if you’ve been hoping to meet your twin flame, and it predicts that you’ll come into contact with them soon. [8] X Research source If you’re not sure if you’ve already met your twin flame, take wikiHow’s “Have I Met My Twin Flame?” quiz to find out.

steps.title: If you're separated from your twin flame, focus on healing yourself.
steps.content: If you're separated from your twin flame, focus on healing yourself. Facing a twin flame separation can be hard, but your angels are telling you to not lose hope. Instead, take this time to focus on healing yourself and making an effort to improve yourself so that you’re at your very best when you meet your twin flame again. Take some time to self-reflect and ask yourself what you can improve within yourself in order to fix your relationship with your twin flame. Take care of yourself during this time as well. Get enough sleep, eat healthy, and exercise regularly to help clear your mind and ward off stress.

steps.title: Fight for your relationship to ensure a happy twin flame reunion.
steps.content: Fight for your relationship to ensure a happy twin flame reunion. When you see angel number 122, it’s a message from your angels telling you that your twin flame is someone worth fighting for. Even though you both might have needed some time away from each other, don’t let them get away from you. [9] X Research source After you’ve taken some time to heal, take initiative and reach out to them. For example, send them a quick text telling them that you miss them or make plans to meet up somewhere.

steps.title: 122 means you’re moving forward on your spiritual journey.
steps.content: 122 means you’re moving forward on your spiritual journey. This number is all about your connections with others and the universe, and it’s a sign that these connections are growing stronger. When you see 122, it’s a sign that you’re making progress on your spiritual journey and are capable of using the positive energy around you to achieve your spiritual goals. [10] X Research source The universe and your angels are watching you and listening to your prayers and thoughts. Don’t hesitate to contact your guardian angels and ask for help when you most need it.

steps.title: 122 challenges you to push yourself in your career.
steps.content: 122 challenges you to push yourself in your career. It’s time to take action within your career when you see 122. Positive changes are on the way, but only if you make an effort to go after them and bring them into your life. Rather than sitting idly and waiting for changes to come, be proactive and take actionable steps to grow within your career. [11] X Research source For example, if you’ve been wanting to go after a promotion, start working on your application materials, reach out to coworkers and friends for advice, and speak with your boss about what you can do to become a stronger candidate. If you’ve been wanting to make a career switch , start looking at job postings and networking with other professionals.

steps.title: Think about new ways you can make money.
steps.content: Think about new ways you can make money. 122 is also about doing new and adventurous things to bring good things into your life. If you’ve been a bit worried about your finances, now might be the time to start brainstorming new ways you can add to your income, even if it’s only a few dollars a month. [12] X Research source For example, you might get a part-time job or start a side hustle, like opening an Etsy store to add to your monthly paycheck.

steps.title: 122 urges you to keep a positive mindset to manifest things.
steps.content: 122 urges you to keep a positive mindset to manifest things. Your angels want you to know that you’ll be able to manifest your deepest desires so long as you keep a positive mindset and stay confident in yourself. If you truly believe something good will happen, it’s more likely to come true. [13] X Research source One thing that can help with manifesting is setting specific goals with actionable steps. As you complete each step, you’ll be even more motivated to go after the things you truly want.

steps.title: Angel number 122 is a symbol of wisdom and love.
steps.content: Angel number 122 is a symbol of wisdom and love. When you look at verses in the Bible that contain 122, many of them are connected by a common message that speaks of wisdom and its power, as well as the consequences that come when a person acts like they know more than they really do. Such messages appear in verses like Proverbs 1:22 and Romans 1:22. Additionally, in verses like Peter 1:22, the message of brotherly love and connection is also highlighted. “How long, O simple ones, will you love being simple? How long will scoffers delight in their scoffing and fools hate knowledge?” —Proverbs 1:22 (English Standard Version) “Claiming to be wise, they became fools…” —Romans 1:22 (ESV) “Having purified your souls by your obedience to the truth for a sincere brotherly love, love one another earnestly from a pure heart…” —Peter 1:22 (ESV)

steps.title: Focus on the positive in your life.
steps.content: Focus on the positive in your life. In order to bring positive changes into your life, your angels want to remind you that it’s important for you to maintain a positive attitude as well. Get rid of any negative thoughts or doubts you may have and focus on the good things happening in your life to manifest even more positivity. [14] X Research source Use positive affirmations to fight off negative thoughts. Tell yourself things like, “I am strong,” “I can do this,” and “Good things are going to happen” to raise your confidence.

steps.title: Let go of the past and live in the present.
steps.content: Let go of the past and live in the present. In order to move forward and enact change, it’s it’s important to let go of the past and simply focus on what you can do right now in the present. Past fears and doubts can hold you back from achieving everything you’re capable of in the present, so make an effort to just focus on now and live in the moment . [15] X Research source One way to help yourself live in the present is to practice gratitude for the things you have. For example, start a gratitude journal and write down 3-5 things you’re thankful for every day.

steps.title: Trust in your intuition.
steps.content: Trust in your intuition. 122 is your angels’ way of telling you that you’re more than capable of achieving whatever you put your mind to. When it comes time to make decisions, believe in yourself and trust your instincts. Your angels have faith in you, so you should too. [16] X Research source Practice mindfulness to get in touch with your inner self and really explore your thoughts and emotions. For example, meditate or do some deep breathing exercises to clear your mind and focus on your feelings.

steps.title: Make an effort to step out of your comfort zone.
steps.content: Make an effort to step out of your comfort zone. Angel number 122 is also about taking risks and not being afraid to step out of your comfort zone . In order to bring these positive transformations into your life, sometimes it’s necessary to take a leap of faith and try new things. [17] X Research source One idea is to do one thing that scare you every day to get yourself out of your comfort zone. You never know when you’ll make a new discovery about yourself, your interests, or the people around you.

steps.title: Nurture the relationships in your life.
steps.content: Nurture the relationships in your life. The number 122 is strongly related to the idea of connections and relationships. This might be a sign to make an effort to strengthen your relationships and spend more time with the people close to you. After all, a lot of good things in life are the result of when you reach out to others and work together. [18] X Research source Make time to see your family and talk to them throughout the week. If you’re going through a rough time, remember that there are people who love you and will be willing to help. Hang out with friends and do fun things together to maintain those strong relationships and bonds.
